pullRequest.body:
In this PR, we formalize the notion of surjective/injective factorizations in concrete categories. We show that this obviously holds in the category of types. In future PRs, it shall be promoted to locally-surjective/locally-injective factorizations in categories of (pre)sheaves, and this shall be used in order to relate locally surjective morphisms and epimorphisms in categories of sheaves (beyond the case of sheaves of types which was obtained in #7721 and #13318).

---

- [x] depends on: #13331

Any other comments you want to keep out of the PR commit should go

will be invisible to reviewers.

If this PR depends on other PRs, please list them below this comment,
using the following format:
- [ ] depends on: #abc [optional extra text]
- [ ] depends on: #xyz [optional extra text]
-->

[![Open in Gitpod](https://gitpod.io/button/open-in-gitpod.svg)](https://gitpod.io/from-referrer/)

nodes.body: Should the spelling be surjective-injective or epi-mono?

This PR/issue depends on:
* ~~leanprover-community/mathlib4#13331~~
By **[Dependent Issues](https://github.com/z0al/dependent-issues)** (ðŸ¤–). Happy coding!
<!-- By Dependent Issues (Action) - DO NOT REMOVE -->

This API (and the downstream applications I intend to do, see #13396) is very much a surjective/injective thing. (In the future, we may deduce this property from epi/mono factorizations, for categories where we can compare epi/surjective and mono/injective, but I feel it would be ackward otherwise.)
